about_the_game:
Blast off to adventure, and blast some robots, too... you'll have plenty of ammunition in the fight against boring soundscapes with the Sci-Fi SFX Pack! Weapons, wooshes, missiles, droids, blasters, beeps, clicks and clunks are what you need to power up the audio engines of your next intergalactic game project. If you're planning a droid invasion or you're boldly going where no one's gone before, this pack is for you!

Features:

- 300 scifi SFX! Blasters, beeps, strange noises, powerups, and other otherworldly audio!
- BONUS CONTENT includes 5 tracks of atmospheric BGM soundscape!
- .ogg and .m4a formats included.
- Royalty free sound effects to use in your commercial and non-commercial RPG Maker MV projects.

detailed_description:
Blast off to adventure, and blast some robots, too... you'll have plenty of ammunition in the fight against boring soundscapes with the Sci-Fi SFX Pack! Weapons, wooshes, missiles, droids, blasters, beeps, clicks and clunks are what you need to power up the audio engines of your next intergalactic game project. If you're planning a droid invasion or you're boldly going where no one's gone before, this pack is for you!

Features:

- 300 scifi SFX! Blasters, beeps, strange noises, powerups, and other otherworldly audio!
- BONUS CONTENT includes 5 tracks of atmospheric BGM soundscape!
- .ogg and .m4a formats included.
- Royalty free sound effects to use in your commercial and non-commercial RPG Maker MV projects.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

name: RPG Maker MV - Sci-Fi Sound Effects

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: RPG Maker MV - Sci-Fi Sound Effects - $14.99 $4.49

package_groups.title: Buy RPG Maker MV - Sci-Fi Sound Effects

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

short_description: Blasters, beeps and bots are just a fraction of the futuristic frequencies you'll find in this auditory anthology of the sounds of science fiction!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Simplified Chinese
